alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 07 at 1:34PM EDT until October 07 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek at Cold Brook. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. Water begins to overflow banks above Ashokan Reservoir with little damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 11.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Cold Brook Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Sat 1 pm: 8.8 Forecast: Sat 2 pm 11.2 Sat 8 pm 10.6 Sun 2 am 8.2 Sun 8 am 7.5 Sun 2 pm 6.8 Sun 8 pm 6.4 Mon 2 am 6.1 Mon 8 am 6.0 Mon 2 pm 5.8 Mon 8 pm 5.8 Tue 2 am 5.7 Tue 8 am 5.7 &&
